trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-ComputerRestorePoint
trans-unit.target: Get-computerrestorepoint

trans-unit.source: Get-ComputerRestorePoint
trans-unit.target: Get-computerrestorepoint

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets the restore points on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取本地计算机上的还原点。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: ID (Default)
trans-unit.target: ID （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LastStatus
trans-unit.target: LastStatus

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-ComputerRestorePoint** cmdlet gets the restore points on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: **Get-computerrestorepoint** cmdlet 获取本地计算机上的还原点。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet can also display the status of the most recent attempt to restore the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 还可以显示最近的计算机还原尝试的状态。

trans-unit.source: You can use the information returned by this cmdlet to select a restore point, and you can use the sequence number to identify a restore point for the Restore-Computer cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此 cmdlet 返回的信息来选择还原点，并可以使用的序列号来标识 Restore-computer cmdlet 还原点。

trans-unit.source: System restore points and the **Get-ComputerRestorePoint** cmdlet are supported only on client operating systems, such as Windows 7, Windows Vista, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 系统还原点和 **Get-computerrestorepoint** cmdlet 支持仅在客户端操作系统，例如 Windows 7、 Windows Vista 和 Windows XP 上。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get all System Restore points from the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 从本地计算机中获取所有系统还原点

trans-unit.source: This command gets all of the System Restore points on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取所有系统还原点在本地计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get all System Restore points with the specified sequence numbers
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 获取与指定的序列号的所有系统还原点

trans-unit.source: This command gets the System Restore points with sequence numbers 232, 240, and 245.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取序列号 232、 240 和 245 的系统还原点。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Display the status of the most recent system restore operation on the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 显示本地计算机上最新的系统还原操作的状态

trans-unit.source: This command displays the status of the most recent System Restore operation on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令显示本地计算机上最新的系统还原操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Display all the System Restore points in a table
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 显示表中的所有系统还原点

trans-unit.source: This command displays the System Restore points in a table for easy reading.
trans-unit.target: 此命令便于阅读的表中显示的系统还原点。

trans-unit.source: The Format-Table cmdlet includes a calculated property that uses the **ConvertToDateTime** method to convert the value of the **CreationTime** property from WMI format to a **DateTime** object.
trans-unit.target: Format-table cmdlet 将包括使用计算的属性 **ConvertToDateTime** 方法将的值转换 **CreationTime** 属性从 WMI 格式 **DateTime** 对象。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Get the sequence number of the most recent System Restore point
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 获取最新的系统还原点的序列号

trans-unit.source: This command gets the sequence number of the most recently created restore point on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取计算机上最近创建的还原点的序列号。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the -1 index to get the last item in the array that this cmdlet returns.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用-1 索引来获取此 cmdlet 返回的数组中的最后一项。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -LastStatus
trans-unit.target: -LastStatus

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets the status of the most recent system restore operation.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将获取最新的系统还原操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: -RestorePoint
trans-unit.target: -早的时间

trans-unit.source: Specifies the restore points, as sequence numbers, that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 作为序列号，此 cmdlet 将获取指定还原点。

trans-unit.source: Enter the sequence numbers of one or more restore points.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个或多个还原点的序列号。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet gets all restore points on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将获取本地计算机上的所有还原点。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将对象传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.ManagementObject#root\default\SystemRestore or String.
trans-unit.target: System.Management.ManagementObject#root\default\SystemRestore 或字符串。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns a **SystemRestore** object, which is an instance of the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) **SystemRestore** class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将返回 **SystemRestore** 对象，它是实例的 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) **SystemRestore** 类。

trans-unit.source: When you use the *LastStatus* parameter, this cmdlet returns a string.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 *LastStatus* 参数，此 cmdlet 将返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: To run a **Get-ComputerRestorePoint** command on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行 **Get-computerrestorepoint** 命令在 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 上，使用运行以管理员身份选项打开 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet uses the WMI **SystemRestore** class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 WMI **SystemRestore** 类。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Checkpoint-Computer

trans-unit.target: Enable-computerrestore

trans-unit.target: 还原计算机
